snippet: Speaker Bobby Harrell of the State House used hundreds of thousands of dollars in campaign funds for personal expenses and falsified his private plane’s logbook to seek payment for travel that did not occur, a nine-count indictment on Wednesday...
abstract: Nine-count indictment says South Carolina Speaker Bobby Harrell of the State House used hundreds of thousands of dollars in campaign funds for personal expenses and falsified his private plane’s logbook to seek payment for travel that did not occur.
lead_paragraph: Speaker Bobby Harrell of the State House used hundreds of thousands of dollars in campaign funds for personal expenses and falsified his private plane’s logbook to seek payment for travel that did not occur, a nine-count indictment on Wednesday said.
